settings.name: customer_id
settings.label: Customer ID
settings.description: Customer ID (Required) of the google ads account you want to sync data from.

settings.name: start_date
settings.label: Start Date
settings.description: Optional date to start sycning data from.

settings.name: end_date
settings.label: End Date
settings.description: Optional date to sync data until.

settings.name: oauth_credentials.authorization_url
settings.label: OAuth Credentials Authorization URL
settings.description: This setting only matters if you plan on doing proxy OAuth. OAuth identity provider authorization endpoint used create and refresh tokens.

settings.name: oauth_credentials.scope
settings.label: OAuth Credentials Scope
settings.description: This setting only matters if you plan on doing proxy OAuth. OAuth scopes we need to request access to.

settings.name: oauth_credentials.access_token
settings.label: OAuth Credentials Access Token
settings.description: This setting only matters if you plan on doing proxy OAuth.

settings.name: oauth_credentials.refresh_proxy_url
settings.label: OAuth Credentials Refresh Proxy URL
settings.description: This setting only matters if you plan on doing proxy OAuth. Will be called with 'oauth_credentials.refresh_token' to refresh the access token

settings.name: oauth_credentials.refresh_proxy_url_auth
settings.label: OAuth Credentials Refresh Proxy URL Auth
settings.description: This setting only matters if you plan on doing proxy OAuth. Sets Authorization header on 'oauth_credentials.refresh_url' request
